Package de.unisiegen.tpml.core.types

Interface Summary
PrettyPrintPriorities This interface includes the pretty print priorities, according to the priority grammar, for the various types.
 

Class Summary
ArrowType This class represents function types (so called arrow types) in our type systems.
BooleanType This class represents the bool type in our type system.
IntegerType This class represents the int type in our type system.
ListType Instances of this class represent list types in our type system.
MonoType Abstract base class for monomorphic types.
PolyType Instances of this class represent polymorphic types, which are basicly monomorphic types with a set of quantified type variables.
PrimitiveType Abstract base class for primitive types, such as bool, int and unit.
RefType Instances of this class represent reference types in our type system.
TupleType This class represents tuple types in our type system.
Type Abstract base class for all types used within the type checker and the various parsers.
TypeVariable This class represents type variables in our type system.
UnitType This class represents the unit type in our type system.
